title: Directs the commissioner of education to create a pilot program to improve physical education/physical activity programs in certain schools
summary: Directs the commissioner of education to create a pilot program for the school years 2011-2012 and 2012-2013 to improve physical education/physical activity programs in certain schools; provides for the repeal thereof on June 30, 2013.
actClause: AN ACT directing the commissioner of education to create a pilot program to improve physical education/physical activity programs in certain schools; and providing for the repeal of such provision upon expiration thereof
